title: 82x2: Application of Prior Version of 18 U.S.C. § 207(a)
summary: A former Government employee who served in the executive branch until 1967 was subject to the post employment restrictions of 18 U.S.C. § 207(a) as read in 1967 and not as amended in 1978 and 1979 where he sought to consult for a subcontractor in a suit arising out of the contracted work with the individual’s former agency.
